statements: DELETE FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND department = 'HR'
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND department = 'Sales';
DELETE FROM employee_turnover WHERE turnover_date < '2022-01-01' AND reason LIKE '%resignation%';
DELETE FROM workforce_demographics WHERE department = 'Sales' AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND department = 'HR';
DELETE FROM TurnoverRates WHERE rate > 10.0 AND rate < 20.0;
DELETE FROM retention WHERE retention_score > 80 AND employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employee WHERE salary < 50000);
